source:
**Opportunity Fact load**

This notebook loads data to deltalake table etlhubconfirmed.dht_market by sourceing data from ESA Kyndryl.
Since ESA is not accessible from Azure, a datastage job srcESA_Opportunity_Daily_Fact_Azure is executed on datastage to push the ESA extract to adls.
Import all the necessary libraries

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws,trim
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from delta.tables import *
import os
import sys
from datetime import datetime
Define Parameters

account_name = 'adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast' # fill in your primary account name 
container_name = 'etlhubfilestorage' # fill in your container name 
relative_path = 'extract/ESA/' # fill in your relative folder path 
relative_archive_path='archive/'
file_name='DS_OPPORTUNITY_DAILY_FACT.csv' 
natural_key="OPPORTUNITY_KEY"
tablename="etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity_daily_ft"
stagingtable="DHTS_OPPORTUNITY_DAILY_FT"
keycolumn="OPPORTUNITY_FACT_KEY"
date = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d-%I:%M:%S_%p")
print(date)
Copy source CSV file to archive folder including timestamp in file name

#Read data from adls csv file extracted from source at 
https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/etlhubfilestorage/extract/ESA/DS_MARKET_DATA.csv

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

adls_arch_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_archive_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

relative_archive_path
# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + file_name
arch_fil_name=file_name.rsplit(".")
csv_archive_path = adls_arch_path + arch_fil_name[0] + '_' + date + '.' + arch_fil_name[1]
print (csv_archive_path)

incrementalData_DF = spark.read.load(csv_path,format="csv", sep="||", header="true")
incrementalData_DF.createOrReplaceTempView('SourceView')
#joining with dimension tables
DIMOPPDataDF=spark.sql("select distinct Src.OPPORTUNITY_NUM,OPP.OPPORTUNITY_KEY as OPPORTUNITY_KEY,CUST.MARKET_KEY,emp.EMPLOYEE_KEY,emp.EMPLOYEE_VERSION,emp_exc.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY,sales.SALES_STAGE_KEY,prev_sales.SALES_STAGE_KEY as PREV_SALES_STAGE_KEY,DECISION_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_CLOSE_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_CREATE_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_UPDATE_DATE,TOTAL_OPP_VAL_USD,OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_UPDATE_DATE,PERF_CRITERIA_CONF,PROP_DELIVERY_DATE,PRICE_AGREEMENT,PRICING_SECURED,INDUS.INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY FROM SourceView Src LEFT OUTER JOIN (select OPPORTUNITY_KEY,OPPORTUNITY_VERSION,OPPORTUNITY_NUM from  etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity where current_ind = 'Y') as OPP ON Src.OPPORTUNITY_NUM=OPP.OPPORTUNITY_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN (select MARKET_KEY,MARKET_VERSION,CUSTOMER_NO,COUNTRY_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_MARKET where current_ind = 'Y') as CUST on Src.CUSTOMER_NO=CUST.CUSTOMER_NO and Src.COUNTRY_CODE=CUST.COUNTRY_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (select t2.EMPLOYEE_KEY,t2.EMPLOYEE_VERSION,t2.CNUM_ID from (select EMPLOYEE_KEY,EMPLOYEE_VERSION,trim(CNUM_ID) as CNUM_ID,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY CNUM_ID ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_KEY DESC) AS Seq from  etlhubConfirmed.DHT_EMPLOYEE where current_ind = 'Y' and IMG_ACTIVE_EMPLOYEE_STATUS_CD='Y' and CNUM_ID is not null) t2 where t2.seq = 1) as emp on Src.EMP_CNUM=emp.CNUM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (select t2.EMPLOYEE_KEY as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY,t2.EMPLOYEE_VERSION as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_VERSION,t2.CNUM_ID as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP from (select EMPLOYEE_KEY,EMPLOYEE_VERSION,trim(CNUM_ID) as CNUM_ID,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY CNUM_ID ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_KEY DESC) AS Seq from  etlhubConfirmed.DHT_EMPLOYEE where current_ind = 'Y' and IMG_ACTIVE_EMPLOYEE_STATUS_CD='Y' and CNUM_ID is not null) t2 where t2.seq = 1) as emp_exc on emp_exc.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP=Src.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SALES_STAGE_KEY,SALES_STAGE_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE where CURRENT_IND='Y') sales ON Src.OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_CODE = sales.SALES_STAGE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SALES_STAGE_KEY,SALES_STAGE_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE where CURRENT_IND='Y') prev_sales ON Src.PREV_OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_CODE = prev_sales.SALES_STAGE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (select CODE,INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY,parentCode from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_INDUSTRY_SECTOR where current_ind = 'Y') as INDUS ON Src.CMR_ISU_CODE=INDUS.CODE AND Src.SUB_INDUSTRY_CODE = INDUS.parentCode")
DIMOPPDataDF.createOrReplaceTempView('SrcDIMJoinView')

# Get column list for creating Rec_Checksum
col_list=[]
for i in DIMOPPDataDF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)

# Add a checsum column to help identify the changed rows  
incrementalData_DF2 = DIMOPPDataDF.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))
incrementalData_DF.write.csv(csv_archive_path, header = 'true')

incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView("incrementalData_DF2")

#Create a dataframe with target deltalake table data with necessary columns

existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT * FROM {}  WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(tablename))

existingMaxKeyDF=spark.sql("SELECT MAX({}) existing_MAX_KEY from {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(keycolumn,tablename))

# prefix all columns from target table with 'existing_'. This will help to differentiate columns when incremental and existing DF's are joined

existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])

existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataDF1')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1, col(natural_key) == col("existing_" + natural_key), "fullouter")

fullJoin2=fullJoin1.join(existingMaxKeyDF,None,"CROSS")

fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')

fullJoin2.write \
  .format("delta") \
  .mode("overwrite") \
  .option("overwriteSchema", "true") \
  .option("path", "abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/staging/{}".format(stagingtable)) \
  .saveAsTable(stagingtable)
   #.option("overwriteSchema", "true") \  .save("") \

Data Validation Checks :

- Check for duplicates in Source data based on natural key
- Check for duplicates in target delta lake table based on natural key

qry3="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM incrementalData_DF2 where {} is not null GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""

qry4="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y' GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""

df3=spark.sql(qry3.format(natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))
cnt1=df3.count()

print (cnt1)
if cnt1 == 0:
    print("No Duplicates in source data")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in source:")
    df3.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(1)
    print("This will not be printed")

print(natural_key)
print(tablename)
df4=spark.sql(qry4.format(natural_key,tablename,natural_key))
cnt2=df4.count()

print (cnt2)
if cnt2 == 0:
    print("no duplicates in target delta lake table")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in target delta lake table:")
    df4.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(2)
    print("This will not be printed")

#Below code can be used to evaluate if the DMLs are successful or not Exception handling purpose
%%sql
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, opportunity_key FROM etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity_daily_ft WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y' GROUP BY opportunity_key HAVING COUNT(*)>1

%%sql
--select Src.OPPORTUNITY_NUM,OPP.OPPORTUNITY_KEY as OPPORTUNITY_KEY,CUST.MARKET_KEY,emp.EMPLOYEE_KEY,emp.EMPLOYEE_VERSION,emp_exc.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY,sales.SALES_STAGE_KEY,prev_sales.SALES_STAGE_KEY as PREV_SALES_STAGE_KEY,DECISION_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_CLOSE_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_CREATE_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_UPDATE_DATE,TOTAL_OPP_VAL_USD,OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_UPDATE_DATE,PERF_CRITERIA_CONF,PROP_DELIVERY_DATE,PRICE_AGREEMENT,PRICING_SECURED,INDUS.INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY FROM SourceView Src LEFT OUTER JOIN (select OPPORTUNITY_KEY,OPPORTUNITY_VERSION,OPPORTUNITY_NUM from  etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity where current_ind = 'Y') as OPP ON Src.OPPORTUNITY_NUM=OPP.OPPORTUNITY_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN (select MARKET_KEY,MARKET_VERSION,CUSTOMER_NO,COUNTRY_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_MARKET where current_ind = 'Y') as CUST on Src.CUSTOMER_NO=CUST.CUSTOMER_NO and Src.COUNTRY_CODE=CUST.COUNTRY_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (select t2.EMPLOYEE_KEY,t2.EMPLOYEE_VERSION,t2.CNUM_ID from (select EMPLOYEE_KEY,EMPLOYEE_VERSION,trim(CNUM_ID) as CNUM_ID,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY CNUM_ID ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_KEY DESC) AS Seq from  etlhubConfirmed.DHT_EMPLOYEE where current_ind = 'Y' and IMG_ACTIVE_EMPLOYEE_STATUS_CD='Y' and CNUM_ID is not null) t2 where t2.seq = 1) as emp on Src.EMP_CNUM=emp.CNUM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (select t2.EMPLOYEE_KEY as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY,t2.EMPLOYEE_VERSION as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_VERSION,t2.CNUM_ID as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP from (select EMPLOYEE_KEY,EMPLOYEE_VERSION,trim(CNUM_ID) as CNUM_ID,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY CNUM_ID ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_KEY DESC) AS Seq from  etlhubConfirmed.DHT_EMPLOYEE where current_ind = 'Y' and IMG_ACTIVE_EMPLOYEE_STATUS_CD='Y' and CNUM_ID is not null) t2 where t2.seq = 1) as emp_exc on emp_exc.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP=Src.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SALES_STAGE_KEY,SALES_STAGE_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE where CURRENT_IND='Y') sales ON Src.OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_CODE = sales.SALES_STAGE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SALES_STAGE_KEY,SALES_STAGE_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE where CURRENT_IND='Y') prev_sales ON Src.PREV_OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_CODE = prev_sales.SALES_STAGE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (select CODE,INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY,parentCode from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_INDUSTRY_SECTOR where current_ind = 'Y') as INDUS ON Src.CMR_ISU_CODE=INDUS.CODE AND Src.SUB_INDUSTRY_CODE = INDUS.parentCode
--select * from incrementalData_DF2 where opportunity_key=25049
select Src.OPPORTUNITY_NUM --,OPP.OPPORTUNITY_KEY as OPPORTUNITY_KEY --,CUST.MARKET_KEY,emp.EMPLOYEE_KEY,emp.EMPLOYEE_VERSION,
--emp_exc.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY,sales.SALES_STAGE_KEY,prev_sales.SALES_STAGE_KEY as PREV_SALES_STAGE_KEY,DECISION_DATE,
--OPPORTUNITY_CLOSE_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_CREATE_DATE,OPPORTUNITY_UPDATE_DATE,TOTAL_OPP_VAL_USD,OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_UPDATE_DATE,
--PERF_CRITERIA_CONF,PROP_DELIVERY_DATE,PRICE_AGREEMENT,PRICING_SECURED,INDUS.INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY 
FROM (select * from SourceView where opportunity_num='SOC-WIJKD3I') as Src 
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select OPPORTUNITY_KEY,OPPORTUNITY_VERSION,OPPORTUNITY_NUM from etlhubConfirmed.dht_opportunity where current_ind = 'Y') as OPP ON Src.OPPORTUNITY_NUM=OPP.OPPORTUNITY_NUM 
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select MARKET_KEY,MARKET_VERSION,CUSTOMER_NO,COUNTRY_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_MARKET where current_ind = 'Y') as CUST on Src.CUSTOMER_NO=CUST.CUSTOMER_NO and Src.COUNTRY_CODE=CUST.COUNTRY_CD 
/*LEFT OUTER JOIN (select t2.EMPLOYEE_KEY,t2.EMPLOYEE_VERSION,t2.CNUM_ID from (select EMPLOYEE_KEY,EMPLOYEE_VERSION,trim(CNUM_ID) as CNUM_ID,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY CNUM_ID ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_KEY DESC) AS Seq from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_EMPLOYEE where current_ind = 'Y' and IMG_ACTIVE_EMPLOYEE_STATUS_CD='Y' and CNUM_ID is not null) t2 where t2.seq = 1) as emp on Src.EMP_CNUM=emp.CNUM_ID 
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select t2.EMPLOYEE_KEY as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY,t2.EMPLOYEE_VERSION as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_VERSION,t2.CNUM_ID as EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP from (select EMPLOYEE_KEY,EMPLOYEE_VERSION,trim(CNUM_ID) as CNUM_ID,row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY CNUM_ID ORDER BY EMPLOYEE_KEY DESC) AS Seq from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_EMPLOYEE where current_ind = 'Y' and IMG_ACTIVE_EMPLOYEE_STATUS_CD='Y' and CNUM_ID is not null) t2 where t2.seq = 1) as emp_exc on emp_exc.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP=Src.EXECUTIVE_SPONSOR_EMP_KEY 
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SALES_STAGE_KEY,SALES_STAGE_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE where CURRENT_IND='Y') sales ON Src.OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_CODE = sales.SALES_STAGE_CD 
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select SALES_STAGE_KEY,SALES_STAGE_CD from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_SALES_STAGE where CURRENT_IND='Y') prev_sales ON Src.PREV_OPPORTUNITY_SALES_STAGE_CODE = prev_sales.SALES_STAGE_CD 
LEFT OUTER JOIN (select CODE,INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY,parentCode from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_INDUSTRY_SECTOR where current_ind = 'Y') as INDUS ON Src.CMR_ISU_CODE=INDUS.CODE AND Src.SUB_INDUSTRY_CODE = INDUS.parentCode
where opportunity_key=25049 */

qry_4_recon1="""

SELECT COUNT(*) from {} A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.{}=B.{}
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

"""
df_4_recon1=spark.sql(qry_4_recon1.format(stagingtable,tablename,natural_key,natural_key))
print('New records or Inserts are:') 
df_4_recon1.show()

qry_4_recon2="""

SELECT COUNT(*) from {} A 
WHERE LOWER({}) = LOWER(existing_{}) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE LOWER(A.{})=LOWER(B.{})
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;

"""
df_4_recon2=spark.sql(qry_4_recon2.format(stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,tablename,natural_key,natural_key))
print('Changed records or Updates are:') 
df_4_recon2.show()

qry_4_recon3="""
SELECT COUNT(*) from 
{} A
join fullJoin B
ON A.{} = B.existing_{}
AND B.{} is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' 
AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT

"""

df_4_recon3=spark.sql(qry_4_recon3.format(tablename,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))
print('Soft Deletes are:') 
df_4_recon3.show()
%%sql
SELECT count(*) FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where current_ind='Y'

#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.
#delete FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_employee;

qry_4_recon1="""
SELECT COUNT(*) from {} A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.{}=B.{}
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)

"""
df_4_recon1=spark.sql(qry_4_recon1.format(stagingtable, tablename, natural_key, natural_key))

qry_ins_new_rows="""

INSERT INTO {}
	select 
	COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS {},1 as VERSION 
,	CUSTOMER_NO
,	CUSTOMER_NM
,	INAC_CD
,	INAC_DESC
,	COUNTRY_CD
,	MARKET_BUSINESS_CD
,	SMB_IND
,	COMPANY_NO
,	ENTERPRISE_NM
,	ENTERPRISE_NO
,	CUST_CITY_NM
,	CUST_STATE_PROV_CD
,	CUST_POSTL_CD
,	ISO_COUNTRY_CD
,	ISO_COUNTRY_DESC
,	CMR_ISU_CD
,	SUB_INDUSTRY_CD
,	CURR_CVRG_TYP_CD
,	CURR_CVRG_TYP_DESC
,	CURR_CVRG_ID
,	CURR_CVRG_NM
,	DLGTD_CVRG_IND
,	BASE_CVRG_TYP_CD
,	BASE_CVRG_TYP_DESC
,	BASE_CVRG_ID
,	BASE_CVRG_NM
,	TERR_ID
,	TERR_NM
,	DBCS_CUSTOMER_NM
,	CLIENT_ID
,	CLIENT_NM
,	CVI_BRNCH_ID
,	CVI_BRNCH_DESC
,	CVI_BRNCH_GRP_CD
,	CVI_BRNCH_GRP_DESC
,	CVI_BRNCH_UNT_ID
,	CVI_BRNCH_UNT_NM
,	SMB_QUADTIER_CD
,	CUST_ACCT_ID
,	RPTS_TO_IMT_ID
,	RPTS_TO_SCTR_CD
,	RPTS_TO_SCTR_DESC
	,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT
	,'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT
	
	,column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM
	,'I' as REC_STATUS
	,'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM
,	CUST_INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY
,	CUST_INDUSTRY_SECTOR_VERSION
,	TERRITORY_RGN_KEY
,	REPORTS_TO_IMT_GEO_KEY
,	FIN_COUNTRY_KEY
	,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT
,	BOID
,	DOMESTIC_CLIENT_ID
,	DOMESTIC_CLIENT_NM
,	GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID
,	GLOBAL_CLIENT_NM
,	GLOBAL_ULTIMATE_CLIENT_ID
,	GLOBAL_ULTIMATE_CLIENT_NM
,	DOMESTIC_BUYING_GROUP_ID
,	DOMESTIC_BUYING_GROUP_NM
,	GLOBAL_BUYING_GROUP_ID
,	GLOBAL_BUYING_GROUP_NM
,	TOP_TREE_ACCT_ID
,	TOP_TREE_ID
,	TOP_TREE_NM
,	'' AS STANDARD_INDUSTRIAL_CLASSIFICATION_CD
,	COV_CLIENT_TYPE
,	COV_CLIENT_TYPE_DESC
,	COV_CLIENT_SUBTYPE
,	COV_CLIENT_SUBTYPE_DESC
	,'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
    from {} A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE A.{}=B.{}
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)
;
"""

d=spark.sql(qry_ins_new_rows.format(tablename,keycolumn,stagingtable,tablename,natural_key, natural_key ))
%%sql
SELECT count(*) FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where current_ind='Y'

#Update or expire the rows with existing instance of the changed rows:
qry_4_upd_changes_rows="""

MERGE INTO {} A
USING {} B
ON A.{} = B.{}
AND LOWER(B.{}) = LOWER(B.existing_{}) 
and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
    ,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;
"""
f=spark.sql(qry_4_upd_changes_rows.format(tablename,stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))

%%sql
--existing data
select 'existing data',count(*) from DHTS_MARKET where existing_CURRENT_IND='Y';
  
select 'rows for Update', count(*)
from etlhubConfirmed.DHT_MARKET B
join
DHTS_MARKET A 
WHERE A.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD = B.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD
and LOWER(A.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD) = LOWER(A.existing_MARKET_BUSINESS_CD) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND B.REC_START_DT=A.existing_REC_START_DT
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.DHT_MARKET B
WHERE LOWER(A.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD)=LOWER(B.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD)
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM etlhubConfirmed.DHT_MARKET A
JOIN DHTS_MARKET B
ON A.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD = B.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD
AND LOWER(B.MARKET_BUSINESS_CD) = LOWER(B.existing_MARKET_BUSINESS_CD) 
and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT

#Insert for changed rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.

qry_ins_changed_rows="""
INSERT INTO {}
	select 
    existing_MARKET_KEY
    ,1 + existing_MARKET_VERSION as VERSION
,	CUSTOMER_NO
,	CUSTOMER_NM
,	INAC_CD
,	INAC_DESC
,	COUNTRY_CD
,	MARKET_BUSINESS_CD
,	SMB_IND
,	COMPANY_NO
,	ENTERPRISE_NM
,	ENTERPRISE_NO
,	CUST_CITY_NM
,	CUST_STATE_PROV_CD
,	CUST_POSTL_CD
,	ISO_COUNTRY_CD
,	ISO_COUNTRY_DESC
,	CMR_ISU_CD
,	SUB_INDUSTRY_CD
,	CURR_CVRG_TYP_CD
,	CURR_CVRG_TYP_DESC
,	CURR_CVRG_ID
,	CURR_CVRG_NM
,	DLGTD_CVRG_IND
,	BASE_CVRG_TYP_CD
,	BASE_CVRG_TYP_DESC
,	BASE_CVRG_ID
,	BASE_CVRG_NM
,	TERR_ID
,	TERR_NM
,	DBCS_CUSTOMER_NM
,	CLIENT_ID
,	CLIENT_NM
,	CVI_BRNCH_ID
,	CVI_BRNCH_DESC
,	CVI_BRNCH_GRP_CD
,	CVI_BRNCH_GRP_DESC
,	CVI_BRNCH_UNT_ID
,	CVI_BRNCH_UNT_NM
,	SMB_QUADTIER_CD
,	CUST_ACCT_ID
,	RPTS_TO_IMT_ID
,	RPTS_TO_SCTR_CD
,	RPTS_TO_SCTR_DESC
,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT
	,'9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT	
	,column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM
	,'U' as REC_STATUS
	,'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM
,	CUST_INDUSTRY_SECTOR_KEY
,	CUST_INDUSTRY_SECTOR_VERSION
,	TERRITORY_RGN_KEY
,	REPORTS_TO_IMT_GEO_KEY
,	FIN_COUNTRY_KEY
	,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT
	,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT
,	BOID
,	DOMESTIC_CLIENT_ID
,	DOMESTIC_CLIENT_NM
,	GLOBAL_CLIENT_ID
,	GLOBAL_CLIENT_NM
,	GLOBAL_ULTIMATE_CLIENT_ID
,	GLOBAL_ULTIMATE_CLIENT_NM
,	DOMESTIC_BUYING_GROUP_ID
,	DOMESTIC_BUYING_GROUP_NM
,	GLOBAL_BUYING_GROUP_ID
,	GLOBAL_BUYING_GROUP_NM
,	TOP_TREE_ACCT_ID
,	TOP_TREE_ID
,	TOP_TREE_NM
,	'' AS STANDARD_INDUSTRIAL_CLASSIFICATION_CD
,	COV_CLIENT_TYPE
,	COV_CLIENT_TYPE_DESC
,	COV_CLIENT_SUBTYPE
,	COV_CLIENT_SUBTYPE_DESC
	,'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from {} A 
WHERE LOWER({}) = LOWER(existing_{}) 
and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM {} B
WHERE LOWER(A.{})=LOWER(B.{})
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;
"""

e=spark.sql(qry_ins_changed_rows.format(tablename,stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,tablename,natural_key,natural_key))

#Soft Deletes - Update Active_Ind for the rows no longer active in source:

qry_4_upd_deleted_rows="""

MERGE INTO {} A
USING {} B
ON A.{} = B.existing_{}
AND B.{} is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' 
AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp

;
"""
g=spark.sql(qry_4_upd_deleted_rows.format(tablename,stagingtable,natural_key,natural_key,natural_key))

%%sql
select 'Number of Active Rows' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
;


select 'Duplicate Rows based on surrogate key' as Title,market_KEY,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    group by market_KEY
    having count(*)>1
;

select 'Duplicate Rows based on natural key' as Title,market_BUSINESS_CD,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    group by market_BUSINESS_CD
    having count(*)>1
;

select 'New rows inserted in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    and date(extract_dt)=current_date and rec_status='I'
;

select 'Changed rows inserted in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    and date(extract_dt)=current_date and rec_status='U'
;

select 'Changed rows updated in this run' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='N'
    and date(REC_END_DT)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;

select 'Rows no longer active in source' as Title,count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
    AND 
     date(REC_END_DT)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;

%%sql
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM etlhubconfirmed.dht_market
WHERE CURRENT_IND='N' and DATE(REC_END_DT)<>'9999-12-31'
    and date(img_lst_upd_dt)=current_date
        limit 1
;


select count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market where CURRENT_IND='Y'
   and date(extract_dt)=current_date --and rec_status='I'
;

select count(*) from etlhubconfirmed.dht_market
WHERE ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    and date(IMG_LST_UPD_DT)=current_date
    ;
UPDATE etlhubconfirmed.dht_market
set CURRENT_IND='Y', 
REC_END_DT='9999-12-31'
  WHERE CURRENT_IND='N' and DATE(REC_END_DT)<>'9999-12-31'
    and date(img_lst_upd_dt)=current_date

qry3="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM incrementalData_DF2 GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""

qry4="""
SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, {} FROM {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y' GROUP BY {} HAVING COUNT(*)>1
;
"""


df4=spark.sql(qry4.format(natural_key,tablename,natural_key))
cnt2=df4.count()

print (cnt2)
if cnt2 == 0:
    print("no duplicates in target delta lake table")
    status = 'success'
else:
    print("Below are the duplicates in target delta lake table:")
    df4.show()
    status = 'fail'
    #os.abort() this will take the spark cluster also down
    sys.exit(2)
    print("This will not be printed")
